name: 88 Pages
description:
You are a powerful wizard, Master of the Six Elements.
But you have reached the limits of magical knowledge.

Every wizard knows the Legend Of The 88 Pages:

An Incantation so powerful that it was written one
syllable at a time on eighty-eight seperate pages!
And the monk transcribing it who went insane and
scattered the pages to the winds of the Haunted Forest.
Where the paths change as quickly as you turn your head.
Where hope and sanity are lost as easily as your life.

You know the danger, and the real chance that you will die.
But this is where your chance for recognition and power lies:
Deep in the Haunted Forest, written on the 88 Pages.

And maybe, if all that is just a myth, you
can at least find some valuable treasure!
